task: Provide a recipe for vegetarian lasagna with more than 100 reviews and a rating of at least 4.5 stars suitable for 6 people.
observation:
This summary reflects the most recent observations only. The user has accessed the "Easy Vegetarian Spinach Lasagna" recipe, which has a 4.6-star rating based on 112 reviews. It meets the criteria of serving 6 people.

The ingredients include:
- Cooking spray
- Salt and ground black pepper to taste
- 1 bunch of fresh spinach
- 9 lasagna noodles
- 1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese
- 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
- 1 large egg, lightly beaten
- 1 pinch ground nutmeg
- 1 pinch dried basil
- 1 cup pasta sauce
- Â¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

Key preparation steps include boiling spinach and lasagna noodles, mixing with cheese and spices, and layering with sauce in a casserole dish before baking.
